name: Lyre
description:
Lyre; 
Never trust a small harp; 
they often turn out to be lyres.

Lyre is a game where you play as a bard that uses well, a lyre.  You can shoot out magical notes that affect the properties of things it hits.

It isn't a very long game but I think it's fun and I hope you do too.

[Controls]
L Shift to run, Wasd to move, Space to jump and Left click to shoot.

This is for the Community Game Jam.
The theme for the game jam was "the game is a liar".
All I saw was a pun and rolled with that.
It also metaphorically goes with the theme and I think that because my game alters the properties of objects.
It changes the bool basically to activate things - true or false.
Which ties into the truth and the lies, or I might be thinking too much into it.
Just from a coding standpoint I think that and I think it is humorous.

ps. I don't know if it is compatible with all os's - i just used the standard build.
